rules_text:
Choose one or both –
• Exile up to X target nonbasic lands. For each land exiled this way, its owner may search their library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then, shuffle.
• Exile up to X target artifacts.
notes:
“Bare your weapons, your hordes unto mine Inferno. Your hubris is intoxicating.”
— Zeramander, Queen of Brimstone
